extension.name: Search properties
extension.author: Dam Dang Thuc
extension.description: Display Advanced Search Form of OS Property component

field.name: show_basic_slide
field.label: Show Basic filter form
field.description: Do you want to show the basic details search form with fields Category, Property type and Price

field.name: show_details_slide
field.label: Show Details filter form
field.description: Do you want to show the details search form with fields like Bathrooms, Bedrooms v.v.

field.name: show_address_slide
field.label: Show Address filter form
field.description: Do you want to show the address search form

field.name: show_amenity_slide
field.label: Show Amenities filter form
field.description: Do you want to show the amenities search form

field.name: show_ordering_slide
field.label: Show Ordering form
field.description: Do you want to show the ordering search form

field.name: show_other_slide
field.label: Show Other filter form
field.description: Do you want to show the other search form with fields like Keyword, Feature filter

field.name: show_agenttype
field.label: Show User filter field
field.description: Do you want to show User filter field.

field.name: property_type
field.label: Use Property type
field.description: Choose the property type which you want to display in search module

field.name: show_price
field.label: Show price filter
field.description: Do you want to show price filter

field.name: show_customfields
field.label: Show custom fields filter
field.description: Do you want to show groups and custom fields filter

field.name: inputbox_width_site
field.label: Inputbox width size (px)
field.description: Please enter the width size (pixel) of the inputobx

field.name: show_advancesearchform
field.label: Show Search form in results
field.description: After selecting the search criteria, you will be redirected to advance search page. In the top of this page, do you want to show the search form.

field.name: samepage
field.label: Results in current page
field.description: If you select Yes, the search result will be shown in the current page - with all modules in current page. If you select No, the search result will be shown in another page without modules in current page.

field.name: show_labels
field.label: Show Labels
field.description: Do you want to show Labels beside fields in Search module

field.name: labelinoneline
field.label: Labels and Fields in 2 lines
field.description: In case the width size of side bar position isn't enough, you can select to show Labels and Fields in different lines.

field.name: opengroups
field.label: Open all group
field.description: If you select Yes, all the fields of all groups in search module will be shown. If you select No, only fields of group Basic Information are shown.
